title: gondel
author: gondel
content: Hello,I would like to buy a gift card for Amazon which works for Europe.Thanks!

comments.author: Heisenberg63
comments.body: Quote from: gondel on July 29, 2022, 09:50:23 AMHello,I would like to buy a gift card for Amazon which works for Europe.Thanks!Amazon UK cards are fine?

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: gondel on July 29, 2022, 09:50:23 AMI would like to buy a gift card for Amazon which works for Europe.Based on what you've written in the subject field, you can try the following reputable options: Bitrefill [.es] or Coinsbee [.de and .es]- There are a bunch of other gift card providers on "this thread", but I prefer to only vouch for the top two.
